page.title: 04Working on a farm in Upton.
page.content: I live in a village called Upton.When i am not at{school }I work on a farm in the village.I mostly work on the tractors and I do most of the grass cutting in June and July. I cut grass for{silage}and three weeks later I do a second cut for hay.Silage is made by tipping all the grass into a large pit and covering it over until the winter.When it is covered it sweats and makes it juicy for the cows to eat.When making the silage I pull trailers behind the tractor;a Ford 7600,for a whole week. In{hay making}time I pull the the bailer which makes the bails.At{ {harvest time}I drive at the side of the combine harvester collecting the grain in a trailer.I also do all the muck spreading and all the hedge cutting.
